General.Name: Alexander Marine Co Ltd
General.Description: Alexander Marine Co., Ltd. engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of yachts in Taiwan, Europe, Australia, and the United States. It also leases real estate properties. In addition, the company offers after sales services and repairs yachts and parts, as well as engages in the general investment activities. Alexander Marine Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1978 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
